ComicInfo.Summary:
The Solution are heroes for hire, willing to take missions for a fee. In Russia, nuclear bases are being attacked by Quattro, four ultra-powered mercenaries, and their nuclear warheads are stolen. Meanwhile, the Solution are in Hong Kong fighting the Dragon Fang, the world's largest Triad group. Eventually, an agent of the KGB tries to hire the Solution to stop Quattro from keeping the warheads. When Shadowmage uses her magic to try to divine more information on Quattro, she finds that Rex Mundi senses her presence and is making plans to retaliate immediately.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/solution-1-the-problem/4000-37785/
ComicInfo.Title: The Problem
